title: Welcome to SIGMACODE Forensics
description: Launch of our AI-powered blockchain forensics blog.
content:
We are launching our AI-powered blockchain forensics blog.

Expect deep-dives into tracing techniques, KYT risk analytics, cross-chain investigations, and case studies.

Follow along as we open-source methods, playbooks, and agent workflows to help you trace crypto crime faster.
author: SIGMACODE Editorial
